column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We have conducted our own field tests by preparing a bowl of ramen and taking the temperature of the broth after 3 minutes of sitting on the service deck. According to our data
column3: the broth will cool to approximately 165 degrees Fahrenheit
column4: which could hardly be described as "lukewarm." Therefore
column6: it is imperative to me to determine how and why any of these mistakes occurred.
